text: Clement Rodney Hampton-El, also known as Dr. Rashid, had been a member of the Moorish Science Temple of America and was convicted in the New York City landmark bomb plot. Why America Slept: The Failure to Prevent 9/11, Random House-, 2003"Terror Ties Of Miami, Florida Muslim Group Go Deep" , by Beila Rabinowitz & William A. Mayer, Pipeline News, 26 June 2006 Hampton-El was born in the United States in 1938. He lived for 25 years in an apartment in the Midwood section of Brooklyn. His neighbors described him as quiet, but nice - he used to buy candy for the neighborhood children. He worked as a laboratory technician in a Brooklyn hospital. Hampton-El died on June 30, 2014.https://www.bop.gov/inmateloc/ ==References== ==External links== * Legal case profile: USA v. title: Clement Rodney Hampton-El
